hadiths.text: Jabir bin Abdullah narrated that :Allah's Messenger said: "Jibril led me (in Salat)". He mentioned something similar to the Hadith of Ibn Abbas (no. 149) in meaning, but he did not mention: "At the time of Asr the day before

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي مَوَاقِيتِ الصَّلاَةِ عَنِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Prescribed Times for Salat From The Prophet
